content: दीप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दीप् क्त] {@--1@} Lighted, inflamed, kindled. {@--2@} Glowing, hot, flashing, radiant. {@--3@} Illuminated. {@--4@} Excited, stimulated. {@--5@} Luminous, bright. {@--6@} Heated by the sun, exposed to sunshine. {@--7@} Inauspicious (in general). --प्तः {@--1@} A lion. {@--2@} The citron tree. {@--3@} Inflammation of the nose. --प्तं Gold.
